channel.title: Big Client.Java Problem For Me
channel.description:
I have a big problem with my Client.Java The problem is that I cannot update my Client.Java, such as add commands, teleports, etc. It works, and complies with Mod Tharoks complier perfectly, but doesnt update the server The only time it worked is when I first downloaded the Pimpscape source I still can mess around with my Client.Java such as mess stuff up and then the complier reads a error, it just wont make commands
One thing that I found weird was that I deleted my client.java, and the server still ran perfectly, with all the old commands I made. I also deleted the commands from Client.Java, and yet still they work
If anyone can help me, that would be a HUGE help to me
Thanks, Rslider

item.title: Big Client.Java Problem For Me
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

Thanks Legend,

My Second problem still aint working

Try and reset whole server in the morning

Read full topic

item.title: Big Client.Java Problem For Me
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

You don’t need a client.java to run a server, thats what you edit your server with

Read full topic

item.title: Big Client.Java Problem For Me
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

No, and now I got another problem
I just updated my router with new firmware so I had to forward the ports again
I tested the ports using the µTorrent port checker and it seems to be just fine
I can ping the server, yet when people join…they cant just says error
Il try and fix this problem myself and see whats in the future

Read full topic

item.title: Big Client.Java Problem For Me
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

I have a big problem with my Client.Java
The problem is that I cannot update my Client.Java, such as add commands, teleports, etc.
It works, and complies with Mod Tharoks complier perfectly, but doesnt update the server
The only time it worked is when I first downloaded the Pimpscape source
I still can mess around with my Client.Java such as mess stuff up and then the complier reads a error, it just wont make commands

One thing that I found weird was that I deleted my client.java, and the server still ran perfectly, with all the old commands I made. I also deleted the commands from Client.Java, and yet still they work

If anyone can help me, that would be a HUGE help to me

Thanks,
Rslider
